locations.name: THE POMEGRANATE
locations.description: The Pomegranate\xe2\x80\x99s menu offers cuisine with flavors from the Middle East, Turkey, and Israel, including fresh and healthy Kosher offerings prepared at a Kosher kitchen in the Beth Shalom Congregation under the strict supervision of the congregation's rabbi. Fresh falafel, hand-carved shawarma sandwiches, hummus, salads, and vegetarian/vegan options are popular menu items.

locations.name: TARTAN EXPRESS
locations.description: The Tartan Express has reopened its doors with roti wraps, a new twist on fast, fresh, and flavorful Indian food on campus! The menu features made-to-order wraps or bowls, topped with your choice of grilled chicken, shrimp, lamb, chickpeas, tofu, fresh veggies, raita, and chutneys, as well as daily $5 options and savory sides like Indian onion fritters, masala fries, and chickpea salad. Drinks and desserts include Indian favorites such as mango lassi, chai tea, rice pudding, and decadent gulab jamun.

locations.name: CITY GRILL
locations.description: Sometimes you just need a burger. When those times come, head over to City Grill for grilled-to-order hand pressed burgers, signature fries from locally-sourced potatoes, and healthy sides like fruit or a salad. Crispy chicken tenders, clubs, and melts are also on the menu.

locations.name: ZEBRA LOUNGE
locations.description: This artsy coffeehouse is located in the Great Hall of the College of Fine Arts. Zebra Lounge is a great place to come for lunch, settle in and study for the afternoon, or show off your artistic talents - vocally, musically or theatrically. The shop features free trade and organic coffees and teas.
locations.location: College of Fine Arts, First Floor\r\n

locations.name: DOWNTOWN DELI
locations.description: The deli offers premium, gourmet sandwiches and wraps, as well as build-your-own deli sandwiches. You get your choice of bread, protein, cheese, and toppings like roasted red peppers and avocado. Quick and delicious \xe2\x80\x93 the way a deli should be!

locations.name: EL BURRITO GRANDE
locations.description: A rotating concept in Resnik Servery, El Burrito Grande serves authentic Mexican burritos, tacos, and burrito bowls made to order with fresh ingredients like cilantro-lime rice, healthful proteins, and tasty toppings including cheese, jalapenos, and sour cream.

locations.name: CARNEGIE MELLON CAF\xc3\x89
locations.description: Stop by the Carnegie Mellon Caf\xc3\xa9 for hot breakfast served all day. New this year are our smoothie & breakfast bowls featuring vegetarian & vegan delights filled with superfoods for a brain boosting treat.  Also enjoy classic American diner sandwiches, wraps, and flatbread sandwiches. Be sure and save room for premium hand-dipped ice cream, banana splits, signature sundaes, malted milkshakes, and of course Starbucks coffee and blended beverages.

locations.name: BREAKFAST EXPRESS
locations.description: Who doesn\xe2\x80\x99t love a delicious and satisfying weekend breakfast? Breakfast Express offers hot breakfast sandwiches, create-your-own waffles and oatmeal bowls, fresh fruit, and coffee. Start Saturday and Sunday off right at Breakfast Express!

locations.name: EL GALLO DE ORO
locations.description: El Gallo offers authentic Mexican cuisine \xe2\x80\x93 burritos and burrito bowls, tacos, quesadillas, and salads \xe2\x80\x93 made with fresh healthful ingredients. Dishes are prepared over the grill to maximize flavor and feature spices like cumin, cilantro, and chipotle.

locations.name: THE EXCHANGE
locations.description: The Exchange offers custom deli sandwiches and homemade salads, soups, and hot entr\xc3\xa9es, as well as fresh baked goods, fruit, yogurt parfaits, nutritional bars, and other grab-and-go items. Beverages include specialty and organic teas, La Prima coffee, and bottled juices.

locations.name: HEINZ CAF\xc3\x89
locations.description: Heinz Caf\xc3\xa9 has a relaxing lounge area with plenty of tables and chairs, making it a peaceful place to stop by for a hot coffee, cold drink, or snack. If your schedule is tight, there are many grab-and-go items like bagels, hummus, baked goods, granola, and yogurt.

locations.name: LA PRIMA ESPRESSO
locations.description: The only certified organic roaster in Pittsburgh, La Prima offers free trade espresso, cappuccino, and coffee, as well as Italian pastries and sandwiches. Located in the lobby of Wean Hall, there are lots of tables and chairs, making La Prima the perfect place to study or relax.

locations.name: THE MAGGIE MURPH CAF\xc3\x89
locations.description: Maggie Murph Caf\xc3\xa9 offers a full line of Starbucks coffee, espresso drinks, Tazo teas, pastries, bagels, made-to-order sandwiches and panini, soup, hot entr\xc3\xa9es, and grab-and-go salads as well as sushi, fruit, yogurt, and a daily variety of breakfast sandwiches and egg frittata.

locations.name: MITCHELL'S MAINSTREET
locations.description: Mitchell's menu features coffee and cappuccino, soups and chili, pizza, and hot entr\xc3\xa9es including subs, wraps, and baked pasta dishes. Mitchell\xe2\x80\x99s also offers a full salad bar and made-to-order sandwiches.

locations.name: NAKAMA
locations.description: Featuring a sushi chef trained in Japan, Nakama Express offers fresh, made-to-order sushi and pre-packaged options. Nakama\xe2\x80\x99s sushi is prepared using the freshest, highest quality seafood and vegetables. Pan-Asian cuisine (rice and noodle bowls) is also available every Monday and Wednesday.

locations.name: GLOBAL FLAVOUR
locations.description: Global Flavour offers up the best in international cuisine and will feature a new country each week. Get ready to take culinary adventures around the globe!

locations.name: PASTA VILLAGGIO
locations.description: Select from Pasta Villaggio\xe2\x80\x99s homemade sauces and fresh pasta to build-your-own pasta bowl or choose from one of our house specialties. All pasta entr\xc3\xa9es are prepared with traditional Italian ingredients and are certified Halal.

locations.name: RICE BOWL
locations.description: Enjoy a unique food concept that pairs Asian cuisine with a Halal-friendly flair, featuring weekly specials and a build-your-own rice bowl. Side options include spring rolls, soups, salad, and fruit.

locations.name: CR\xc3\x8aPERIE
locations.description: Indulge your palate with a taste of traditional French cuisine \xe2\x80\x93 freshly prepared entr\xc3\xa9e and dessert crepes. Chef-inspired ingredients are served in delicate handmade crepes.

locations.name: ENTROPY+
locations.description: Entropy+ is Carnegie Mellon's on-campus convenience store. In addition to the large variety of grocery items, health and beauty aids, bottled beverages, snacks, and sweets, Entropy offers fresh-made breakfast sandwiches, salads, and Orthodox Kosher to-go options.

locations.name: GINGERS EXPRESS (BAKER)
locations.description: Gingers Express offers custom deli sandwiches and homemade salads, soups, and hot entr\xc3\xa9es. Beverages include specialty and organic teas, La Prima coffee, premium bottled juices, and waters. The Exchange features fresh baked goods, fruit, yogurt parfaits, nutritional bars, other grab-and-go items.

locations.name: GINGERS EXPRESS (PURNELL)
locations.description: Gingers Express offers custom deli sandwiches and homemade salads, soups, and hot entr\xc3\xa9es. Beverages include specialty and organic teas, La Prima coffee, premium bottled juices, and waters. The Exchange features fresh baked goods, fruit, yogurt parfaits, nutritional bars, other grab-and-go items.

locations.name: SPINNING SALADS
locations.description: Build your own salad at Spinning Salads by choosing your greens, veggies, proteins, and toppings or choose from one of our chef\xe2\x80\x99s featured salads.

locations.name: SPICE IT UP GRILL
locations.description: This premium grill is open for lunch and dinner with signature, top-your-own hand-packed all-beef, turkey, black bean, and portabella burgers, as well as chicken breast sandwiches. Lunch and dinner entr\xc3\xa9es such as steak, chicken, and fish paired with a variety of chef\xe2\x80\x99s choice sides are also on the menu.

locations.name: SCHATZ DINING ROOM
locations.description: Schatz is Carnegie Mellon\xe2\x80\x99s all-you-care-to-eat breakfast and dinner buffet for those looking to indulge in a home-cooked meal or a soup and salad bar. During lunch, Schatz becomes a faculty, staff, and graduate student dining room. Visit Schatz on Saturday and Sunday for an all-you-care-to-eat brunch featuring omelets, frittatas, breakfast pastries, pancakes, waffles, fruit, and more.\r\n\r\n

locations.name: CHEF'S TABLE
locations.description: Every Tuesday and Thursday, our chefs transform Take Comfort into a fine dining experience with gourmet restaurant-style meals.

locations.name: iNOODLE
locations.description: Carnegie Mellon's newest authentic Asian cuisine concept, iNoodle features an open kitchen environment; improved traffic flow for ordering, check out, and pick up; customizable, made-to-order meals; bubble tea; grab-n-go items; and pre-ordering with GET Food.

locations.name: FRESH SELECT SOUP & SALAD
locations.description: Fresh Select offers a salad bar with a variety of greens, veggies, grains, toppings, and dressing as well as two hot soups available daily. Take advantage of our value prices including all-you-care-to-eat and a la carte menu options!

locations.name: THE UNDERGROUND
locations.description: A student hangout and restaurant, The Underground features hamburgers, chicken tenders, pasta, soups, salads, breakfast all day, fruit, and desserts, as well as daily lunch and dinner specials. Opening early and closing late, The Underground is a popular spot for gatherings and student-sponsored events.

locations.name: AU BON PAIN AT SKIBO CAF\xc3\x89
locations.description: At Au Bon Pain caf\xc3\xa9 bakery, each signature recipe is uniquely crafted. You can enjoy delicious hot or iced coffee and teas, espresso drinks, a variety of cold beverages, soup, a customized made-to-order breakfast or lunch sandwich or salad, or you can grab a pre-made salad, sandwich, wrap, yogurt parfait, fresh fruit or snack. There is always something new to try ... healthy choices, comfort food, indulgent treats \xe2\x80\xa6 try them all!

locations.name: TASTE OF INDIA
locations.description: Taste of India offers delicious Indian cuisine, including chicken tikka masala and other traditional favorites. You can make-your-own boxes for dinner in order to sample many dishes as part of one meal. Stop by and enjoy a Taste of India!

locations.name: TAZZA D'ORO
locations.description: One of the best espresso bars in Pittsburgh, Tazza D\xe2\x80\x99Oro \xe2\x80\x93 which means \xe2\x80\x9ccup of gold\xe2\x80\x9d \xe2\x80\x93 is known for exceptional coffee and espresso drinks, highly skilled baristas, and a strong commitment to purchasing locally sourced food for delicious panini, pastries, and desserts.

locations.name: STIR CRAZY
locations.description: Pan-Asian your way! Pick your protein, add some veggies, sauce it, and let us stir fry it! Stir Crazy\xe2\x80\x99s made-to-order stir fry bowls are available on Saturday and Sunday for dinner.

locations.name: TARTANS PIZZA
locations.description: Scratch-made personal pies have landed at the Tartans Pavilion. With three house-made dough pie shells to choose from, a huge variety of sauces, cheeses, and toppings, you can create your own pizza, pasta, or salad. Ingredients are made fresh daily and pies are oven-fired on the spot.

locations.name: STEPHANIE'S
locations.description: A convenient location for Mellon Institute students and Oakland residents, Stephanie's features bakery goods, fruit, yogurt, nutritional bars, and other grab-and-go items. Fresh wraps, deli sandwiches, soups, and homemade salads are available for lunch, along with specialty and organic teas, Starbucks coffee, and bottled juices.

locations.name: TAKE COMFORT
locations.description: Craving a taste of home? Take comfort in our rotisserie chicken, turkey, pork, beef sirloin, and seafood specialties or savor the flavor of our daily vegetarian entr\xc3\xa9e. All entr\xc3\xa9es are served with a variety of home-style sides and vegetables.

locations.name: SEIBER CAF\xc3\x89
locations.description: Enjoy the chef'\xe2\x80\x99s choice of daily hot entr\xc3\xa9es, house-made soups, hot and cold sandwiches, fresh pastries, freshly brewed coffee, and the self-serve salad bar at the SEIber Caf\xc3\xa9. A CMU ID is required to enter the SEI building.

locations.name: GRILL'N'GREENS
locations.description: Every Monday, Wednesday, and Friday at the Global Flavour station in Resnik, enjoy chef-prepared fresh, lean proteins and super food greens ... grilled! Grill'n'Greens offers whole foods at their best - simply prepared and bursting with flavor and nutrition.

locations.name: SAIGON PHO
locations.description: Every Tuesday and Thursday at the Global Flavour station in Resnik, enjoy authentic pho (Vietnamese noodle soup), house-made broths, and savory proteins with the option of various fresh toppings.

locations.name: ROTHBERG'S ROASTERS II
locations.description: Rothberg's Roasters II is centrally located in Scott Hall. The caf\xc3\xa9 is a vibrant gathering space for the entire university, offering tasty and healthy options for breakfast, lunch, and dinner, Tazo teas, Starbucks coffee, and much more!

locations.name: RESNIK SERVERY
locations.description: Resnik Servery is an all-you-care-to-eat dining location open for breakfast, lunch, and dinner. It offers a full-service soup and salad bar, deli, pizza station, and delicious entr\xc3\xa9es served buffet style. It's the best deal on campus during the summer!

locations.name: NOURISH
locations.description: Nourish is an allergen-friendly kitchen, featuring a menu prepared without gluten, wheat, milk, egg, soy, fish, shellfish, peanuts, and most tree nuts (except coconut). In addition to offering a diverse and delicious menu designed with everyone in mind, Nourish serves safe foods for our guests with dietary restrictions.

locations.name: RAMEN BOWL
locations.description: New this year to our marketplace, we are serving up authentic ramen bowls with house made broths and your choice of ingredients complete with a seven minute egg!

locations.name: GARDEN BISTRO
locations.description: New to Resnik this year, featuring 100% vegan, plant-based cuisine, choose from our chef\xe2\x80\x99s signature sandwiches or build your own saut\xc3\xa9 bowl with the power of plants!

locations.name: MAC 'N' CHEESE
locations.description: Make your own mac'n cheese ... we know, genius right?!  Choose from 3 styles of mac'n cheese, add stir-ins and toppings, then enjoy your creation broiled to perfection. Featuring one selection for those avoiding gluten and dairy.
